## Import.ImporterFilesystem.getEntry() method

Gets the file system entry for the given absolute path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getEntry(absolutePath: string): Result<IImporterFsEntry>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

absolutePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the absolute path to check.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IImporterFsEntry](./ts-res.import.iimporterfsentry.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the entry if successful, `Failure` with an error message if not.

## Remarks

Fails for any entry that is not a file or directory.
